1. First, connect to ssh with your ip address :

ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub level00@165.22.17.96 -p 4242

you will see… ``` ___ ___ _ / __| / __| | | | (_ _ __ ___ | | _ __ __ _ _| | ___ | ‘ \ / _ \ \ /\ / / | | ‘/ ` / __| ‘
